title: Installation issue: petsc build fails on all platforms
body:
Trying to build `petsc@3.13.1` with `gcc@7.3.0` fails on all tested platforms using `spack@develop` commit id `c4031f045512` from 25-May-2020:
* ubuntu 18.04 x86_64 and ppc64le
* rhel7, rhel8 x86_64
* centos7, centos8 x86_64

I suspect this is due to a commit to Spack within past couple of weeks because I had been building it regularly, without error, in the same way, on all the platforms listed above.
